title: Sidewall, 1940–45
creditline: Gift of A.L. Diament and Co.
description: A reproduction of a wallpaper printed in France by Zuber. In style of provincial Empire but during the early Greek Revival, 1820-30. Composed of two alternating motifs. One is a pastoral scene of browsing cattle in a meadow with distant hill in background. The second motif is a tall basket filled with flowers. Vertical bands are on either side with a Greek anthemion for the motif. Printed in shades of green on white ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, 1940–45.
1940–45. Screen printed. Gift of A.L. Diament and Co.. 1946-98-9.
